name: Customizable Cicada Car: Tech Art 1 Project by Jack Chambers
name_original: Customizable Cicada Car: Tech Art 1 Project by Jack Chambers
description:
Part 2 of the Cicada asset alterations. The car now has 4 sets of tattoos to place on the vehicle, and the interior and paint of the car can change color, while still keeping surface details. Sliders are not currently in place, so demo file contains one color pairing and 1 set of decals. See write-up for details.

Car can be rotated using left and right arrows, and otherwise click away!

Demo video of this project can be found here:

Tattoo and asset sources found at the following links:

Retro Cartoon Cars - Cidada asset from RCC Design: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/retro-cartoon-cars-cicada-96158

Embroidered Patch/Applique- sideview Skull and roses sketch by PeriwynklePlace: https://www.etsy.com/listing/467504529/embroidered-patch-applique-sideview?ref=hp_rf

Loopy Skull Image: https://wallhere.com/en/wallpaper/800713

Game Controller Heart Graphic: http://6iee.com/466371.html

Design Patterns|Geometric Patterns| black and white| Corel DRAW tutorials|015 by Mohamed Sewelam: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IOfnCoc4ig4

Flames Graphic: http://www.clipartpanda.com/clipart_images/posted-by-udaya-kumar-at-03-45-44321314
